welcome.title: Agri-Eco Smart Chain - Next-gen on-chain infrastructure
hero.desc: AESC (Bluepine Tech Foundation) merges blockchain, AI, IoT and Web3 (RWA/RDA, DeFi) into a trusted data platform — credible flows, precise services, fair value.
overview.title: Wealth agriculture, sow the future | AESC global sale plan
overview.subtitle: We are not only issuing tokens, but building a new economic ecosystem connecting blockchain and real agriculture.
tokenomics.cards.ecofund.title: Eco Construction Fund
tokenomics.cards.ecofund.desc: Continuous ecosystem development, including tech iteration, eco incentives, node rewards and community events.
tokenomics.cards.ecofund.quote: "The Eco Construction Fund is the cornerstone of AESC's long-term growth. Release 1/40 per month over 40 months to steadily foster ecosystem prosperity and technological innovation."
tokenomics.cards.airdrop.title: Community Airdrop
tokenomics.cards.airdrop.desc: Rewards for early community users, test participants and active contributors, enhancing cohesion and engagement.
tokenomics.cards.airdrop.quote: "Community users who complete tasks will receive airdrops, released linearly over 6 months — thank you for growing with AESC!"
tokenomics.cards.reserve.title: Reserve
tokenomics.cards.reserve.desc: Risk reserve for contingencies, market volatility and emergency subsidies, governed by community voting.
tokenomics.cards.reserve.quote: "The reserve is jointly governed by the community with transparent management, used to address uncertainties and support ecosystem emergencies, safeguarding the project."
tokenomics.cards.partners.title: Partners
tokenomics.cards.partners.desc: Incentivize strategic partners, technical collaborators and co-builders to advance multi-party cooperation and resource integration.
tokenomics.cards.partners.quote: "Partner tokens are unlocked progressively by cooperation milestones, up to 12 months in total, empowering win-win and long-term collaboration."
vesting.title: Progressive release, safeguarding long-term token value
vesting.subtitle: We adopt a strategy of "10% released within 7 days after the private sale + the remaining 90% released linearly over 12 months", starting monthly from day 8.
vesting.rhythm.title: Release Rhythm
vesting.rhythm.detail: From 8th day after private sale · Linear release over 12 months
footer.description: From a single field to a planet-scale intelligent network. We are building the future of agriculture. Agri-Eco Smart Chain is committed to digitization, intelligence and decentralization of global agriculture. Here, every contribution is remembered and every value is respected.
footer.disclaimer: Compliance disclosure · For qualified market participants only. All information is for reference only.
cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.subtitle: Improve your browsing experience
cookie.text_prefix: We use cookies to optimize site functionality. See
roadmap.phase1.title: Build & Launch
roadmap.phase1.p1: Core tasks: Team setup, architecture design, whitepaper release, start AESC airdrop and private sale.
roadmap.phase1.p2: Milestones: Pilot intent with 2 agricultural regions; 150k global active users join airdrop and private sale.
roadmap.phase2.title: Pilot & Expansion
roadmap.phase2.p1: Core tasks: Deploy base platform, integrate IoT devices, test AI models, launch DeFi lending and RWA issuance.
roadmap.phase2.p2: Milestones: 500 farmers in beta, AI diagnosis accuracy ≥ 85%; cover 5 countries, RWA volume $500M.
roadmap.phase3.title: Mainnet & Ecosystem Maturity
roadmap.phase3.p1: Core tasks: Testnet and developer ecosystem, mainnet launch and migration, carbon module, global standards and cooperation.
roadmap.phase3.p2: Milestones: Fund 30 ecosystem projects; 100 nodes, carbon trading > $100M; 100+ projects, top-50 market cap.
overview.early_benefit: Early subscribers enjoy the best price
tokenomics.title: Token allocation structure focusing on liquidity and long-term value
tokenomics.intro: AESC total supply is 1.6B. Through multi-dimensional allocation, value is balanced across ecosystem, team, exchange, airdrop, reserve and partners.
features.title: Core Capability Matrix
features.subtitle: From execution to interoperability to governance, we provide a complete infra stack.
features.modular.title: Modular Execution
features.modular.desc: Pluggable VMs and consensus layers for enterprise-grade elasticity.
features.interop.title: Cross-chain Interop
features.interop.desc: Native cross-chain messaging and bridges unifying multi-chain value flow.
features.rwa.title: Real-world Assets
features.rwa.desc: Compliance credentials for RWA, supply chain and carbon assets.
features.compliance.title: Compliance Security
features.compliance.desc: Identity governance and permissions for global regulatory audits.
features.liquidity.title: Liquidity Engine
features.liquidity.desc: Cross-chain liquidity and yield aggregation to amplify capital efficiency.
features.governance.title: Governance
features.governance.desc: DAO with validators to drive continuous ecosystem evolution.
features.header: Agri-Eco Smart Chain tri-fusion, tech empowerment
features.header_desc: A "human - machine - thing" tri-fusion architecture for a trustworthy and efficient full data lifecycle.
roadmap.header_desc: Phased delivery for infra, real-world assets and global expansion.
features.stats.semantic.label: Semantic blockchain
features.stats.semantic.note: Trusted data anchoring builds the foundation of trust
features.stats.ai_engine.label: Agri AI engine
features.stats.ai_engine.note: Accurate diagnosis and alerts across fields
features.stats.web3.label: Web3 protocols
features.stats.web3.note: Autonomous value flow reshapes distribution rules
vesting.header: Three-phase release balancing growth and liquidity safety
vesting.header_desc: Initial unlock + lock-up + stable monthly distribution to balance community returns and market supply-demand.
vesting.phase.initial: Within 7 days after private sale, unlock 10% immediately.
vesting.phase.linear: From day 8, unlock 7.5% monthly; total 90% over 12 months.
tokenomics.cards.private_sale.title: Private Sale
tokenomics.cards.team.title: Team Incentives
tokenomics.cards.exchange.title: Exchange
referral.description: Invite friends to join the private sale and receive 5% of their purchase amount in token rewards.
faq.a1: AESC Token focuses on digitizing the agricultural ecosystem with blockchain technology, connecting farmers, consumers and investors.
faq.q2: How to participate in the private sale?
faq.a2: Connect your wallet, choose stage and amount, confirm transaction. Fully on-chain and transparent.
faq.a3: 10% released within 7 days after private sale, remaining 90% linearly over 12 months (7.5% per month).
faq.a4: Refer friends to participate and receive 5% of their purchase; distributed once within 7 days after private sale.
faq.a5: Blockchain + IoT + AI + smart contracts: traceability, supply chain, intelligent monitoring and more.
faq.a6: Traceability payments, device leasing, insurance, governance voting, quality rewards, etc.
